timeline.message: adding page Id to in app message action
adding page impression rest call and page changed logic
Unit test for page changed event
matching json to backend spec change

timeline.bodyText: Looks like this is a TODO yet?
timeline.author: jkasten2

replies.bodyText: Yes this was my question at the end of the PR do we need to save the ids to the prefs?
replies.author: emawby

replies.bodyText:
The only scenario that I think needs this.
1 - Opening app
2 - Display IAM
3 - Impression sent
4 - Close application (swipe away) without dismiss IAM
5 - Open app
6 - IAM should display again
7 - Impression shouldn't be sent again
replies.author: Jeasmine

replies.bodyText: Cool confirmed that this is an issue so I will store them in the prefs
replies.author: emawby

timeline.bodyText:
this is marked as notNull but
pageId = json.optString(PAGE_ID, null); it could end being null, maybe set a default value? tr change to Nullable
timeline.author: Jeasmine
Jeasmine

timeline.bodyText: this is checked under onPageChanged too, is that ok?
timeline.author: Jeasmine

replies.bodyText: Now only checking in the rest method call for consistency with iOS and better separation of concerns
replies.author: emawby

timeline.author: Jeasmine

replies.bodyText: oh, weird 🤔  test setup should not break tests, can you point out which error it is?
replies.author: Jeasmine

replies.bodyText: Ah sorry the crash can be fixed, but you need to initialize to have the player id etc for the request
replies.author: emawby

timeline.bodyText: is ok to test without mocking the IAM display?
timeline.author: Jeasmine

replies.bodyText: Yes we test without mocking the iam display for clicks as well and they should be entirely independent
replies.author: emawby

timeline.bodyText: same question as on iOS, see OneSignal/OneSignal-iOS-SDK#735 (comment)
timeline.author: Jeasmine

replies.bodyText: same fix as ios. only tracking globally now, but it is still per inapp since we don't want them to affect each other (in local testing I was getting duplicate page ids for different inapps which is why I prefixed the page id with the message id)
replies.author: emawby

timeline.bodyText: can we put some comment over this desition of cleaning impressions, so we know in the future?
timeline.author: Jeasmine
